solution_line_template: Bridgette and Alex's guests will need {bridgette_guests} + {alex_guests} = <<{bridgette_guests}+{alex_guests}={total_guests}>>{total_guests} plates.
The caterer makes {extra_plates} extra plates, so they will need {total_guests} + {extra_plates} = <<{total_guests}+{extra_plates}={total_plates_needed}>>{total_plates_needed} plates.

To put {asparagus_per_plate} asparagus spears on each plate, the caterer will need {total_plates_needed} * {asparagus_per_plate} = <<{total_plates_needed}*{asparagus_per_plate}={total_asparagus_spears}>>{total_asparagus_spears} asparagus spears.
